trans-unit.resname: SS2·1 | Gideon Jura | Card Name
SS2·1 | Gideon Jura | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: +2: During target opponent's next turn, creatures that player controls attack CARDNAME if able.
trans-unit.target: +2: During target opponent's next turn, creatures that player controls attack CARDNAME if able.

trans-unit.resname: SS2·1 | Gideon Jura | Card Text | Paragraph 2
SS2·1 | Gideon Jura | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: 0: Until end of turn, CARDNAME becomes a 6/6 Human Soldier creature that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.
trans-unit.target: 0: Until end of turn, CARDNAME becomes a 6/6 Human Soldier creature that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.

trans-unit.resname: SS2·2 | Martyr's Bond | Card Name
SS2·2 | Martyr's Bond | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another nonland permanent you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a permanent that shares a card type with it.
trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME or another nonland permanent you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a permanent that shares a card type with it.

trans-unit.resname: SS2·3 | Path to Exile | Card Name
SS2·3 | Path to Exile | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle their library.
trans-unit.target: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle their library.

trans-unit.resname: SS2·4 | Rest in Peace | Card Name
SS2·4 | Rest in Peace | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile all cards from all graveyards.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile all cards from all graveyards.

trans-unit.resname: SS2·4 | Rest in Peace | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

trans-unit.resname: SS2·5 | Shielded by Faith | Card Name
SS2·5 | Shielded by Faith | Card Text | Paragraph 1
SS2·5 | Shielded by Faith | Card Text | Paragraph 2
SS2·5 | Shielded by Faith | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you may attach CARDNAME to that creature.
trans-unit.target: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you may attach CARDNAME to that creature.

trans-unit.resname: SS2·6 | True Conviction | Card Name
SS2·6 | True Conviction | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control have double strike and lifelink.
trans-unit.target: Creatures you control have double strike and lifelink.

trans-unit.resname: SS2·7 | Worship | Card Name
SS2·7 | Worship | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.
trans-unit.target: If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

SS2·8 | Blackblade Reforged | Card Text | Paragraph 1
